{"id":1304390742,"question_id":3469,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1719717407,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1304390742/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Height of a Triangle","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxHeightOfTriangle(int red, int blue) { //1 <= red, blue <= 100\n        int max_height = 100;\n        int height = 0;\n        int odd = 0;\n        int even = 0;\n        int min_ball = min(red, blue);\n        int max_ball = max(red, blue);\n        int minBefore = 0;\n        int maxBefore = 0;\n        while( maxBefore < max_ball &&   minBefore <= min_ball ) {\n            height++;\n            if(height % 2 != 0 ) {\n                odd += height;\n            } else {\n                even += height;\n            };\n            minBefore = min(odd, even);\n            maxBefore = max(odd, even);\n        }\n        \n        if(maxBefore == max_ball &&   minBefore == min_ball)\n            return height;\n        \n        return height-1;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-height-of-a-triangle","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
